settings.section-heading: Wake up and let the good vibes begin
settings.section-desd: Boost your day without gettingthe jitters. Here’s a smarter and 100% natural alternative to energy drinks.
settings.fb-desc: Life’s full of ups and downs.  That’s why we packed this drink with functional ingredients that help you take it all in stride. Natural caffeine from organic cold brew joins forces with ginger, maca and yuzu to uplift your mood while enhancing memory and focus. So you can boost your energy while keeping things in balance.
settings.cb-desc: Get your caffeine fix without the side effects. With 100% natural caffeine from cold brew in every drink, you can enjoy a more sustainable boost in energy and mental clarity without the jitters and crashes you get from most artificial energy drinks.
settings.smooth-desc: Hit the refresh button – Sucralose -sweet? Aspartame aftertaste? Nope, and no thank you. We skipped all the artificial stuff and fueled our smooth and refreshing formula with natural caffeine, crispy bubbles, and deliciously functional ingredients made 100% by nature. What’s better?
settings.nat-desc: Goodbye sugar and Sucralose. You’ll only find the good stuff here. That is: Natural caffeine from organic cold brew, a dash of sweetness from real fruit, and other 100% natural, feel-good plant-based ingredients.

settings.section-desc: Our vision is to create the world’s smartest coffee brand for the next generation

settings.section-heading: “ No bitterness and acids are less noticeable in ”.

settings.section-heading: A better functioning world with every sip
settings.section-desc: We started Mode in 2016 to help people function better naturally with a smarter and healthier alternative to coffee and energy drinks.Every year, we donate 10% of our profit to the Tim Bergling Foundation to rise mental health awareness among young people

settings.tab1-desc: We brew our premium, organic beans for 16 hours in cold filtered water to extract all the things you love about coffee, and none of the things you don’t. Totally stomach friendly and free from bitterness. Just smooth and refreshing. Ready to mix when you are.
